name: Skirmish (itch) (VeryTacticalS)
description:
An fully featured RTS with world generation, a research and development system, challenging AI, and many more features.

This is a hobby project of mine that I've been working on for about 2 years. The goal of each game is to find and destroy the enemy HQ's while defending yours against attacks. I recommend starting with the campaign mode as it gradually showcases most of the climates/equipment types. There is a tutorial section in the main menu which should cover most features. If you encounter any issues or have any suggestions, I'd love to hear them in the comments.
